<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Security & sign-in">5a981f58bd4d12102073a59ae588009a</macroponent><name>Checking MFA setup</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {any} params.event
 * @param {any} params.imports
 * @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function handler({
    api,
    event,
    helpers,
    imports
}) {
    var modelData = api.data.gliderecord_query_1.output.data.GlideRecord_Query.sys_properties._results[0].value.value;
    var mfa = {};
    if (modelData == "false") {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Please enable Multi-factor authentication on the instance."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', true);
    } else {
        api.setState('propertyText', helpers.translateSync("Configure Multi-factor authentication by clicking the button below."));
        api.setState('propertyValue', false);
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-01 04:06:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>56981f58264d1210d8a2afd7b9b9c79b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Checking MFA setup</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Reservation System" source="x_1385354_reserv_0">8c3545be833092109586e590ceaad34f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Reservation System">8c3545be833092109586e590ceaad34f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_56981f58264d1210d8a2afd7b9b9c79b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-01 04:06:29</sys_updated_on><target/><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
